Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:E. coli (MIC=6.25-12.5 µM);Gram-positive bacterium:M. luteus (MIC=25-50 µM).Fungus:N. crassa.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: In vitro experiments showed that the 6.8-kDa mature peptide can kill both Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria, has a morphogenic effect on a filamentous fungus, and is marginally lethal to Plasmodium berghei ookinetes.
Sequence Information.Induction: Predominantly expressed in the anterior part.

Literature.Title: Gambicin a novel immune responsive antimicrobial peptide from the malaria vector Anopheles gambiae.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2001 Oct 23;98(22)12630-5.
Literature.Author: Vizioli J, Bulet P, Hoffmann JA, Kafatos FC, Müller HM, Dimopoulos G.
